revised_title: Gametogenesis and Chromosome Count in the Gall-Fly Neuroterus Lenticularis
tldr: The author investigates the gametogenesis of the gall-fly Neuroterus lenticularis, focusing on the maturation of eggs and the development of both male and female individuals. The study reveals that each female produces either male or female offspring, and provides insights into the chromosome count in somatic and germ cells of the species.
